alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN WALLACE AND SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM MDT/MIDNIGHT CDT/... At 1025 PM MDT/1125 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Sharon Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wallace around 1030 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT/midnight CDT/ for west central Kansas.
